attributes.action: ENSURE PRISON SENTENCES ARE THE TIMESCALES HANDED DOWN I.E. 10 YEARS MEANS 10 YEARS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why are so many criminals getting sentences that just seem inadequate only for them to automatically serve half?
If a judge sees it fit to sentence for life this should mean life. If however when they say life knowing it will only be 5 years then the sentence should be 5 years. Make the sentence reflective of the physical time behind bars.

rejection.details: Please resubmit without BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult for people to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
